products.name: T-shirt in premium cotton
products.description: A lot of self-importance goes on in the fashion industry. I'm not like that.

products.name: Shirt in linnen mix
products.description: Some people think luxury is the opposite of poverty. It is not. It is the opposite of vulgarity.

products.name: Sweater in merino wool
products.description: I think in the darkest moments, we need a break. Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.

products.name: Biker jacket in leather
products.description: Awkwardness gives me great comfort. I've never been cool, but I've felt cool.

products.name: Wool suit trousers
products.description: I have a fantastic relationship with money. I use it to buy my freedom.

products.name: Slim jeans in tech stretch
products.description: I always loved aesthetics. Not particularly fashion, but an idea of beauty.
